hotels.vendor_name: Les Roches Rouges, a Beaumier Hotel
hotels.title: Boutique Cote D'Azur Nature-Inspired Escape with Two Pools, Spa & Michelin-Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: Discover the beauty of Southern France with a dreamy five-star stay at this boutique oasis , nestled between the garnet-red mountains of Esterel Massif and the azure waters of the Mediterranean. Bathed in light, Les Roches Rouges, Saint Raphael, a Beaumier Hotel boasts breathtaking views in a secluded and spectacular part of the world. During your stay, enjoy Michelin-starred dining by the sea at Récif Restaurant, feasting on the finest seafoods and meats from the hinterland. Enhance your relaxation even further with a massage or treatment at Les Roches Rouges Spa, a dip in one of the two pools facing the sea, or a private sailing excursion along the Esterel coastline.
